Rulings.Edison:
●A Rainbow Dragon or Rainbow Dark Dragon in the GY that was not first properly Special Summoned Cannot be Special Summoned with Rainbow Gravity.
●If an effect is chained that reduces the number of Crystal Beast monsters with different names to 6 or less, Rainbow Gravity's effect still resolves.

Rulings.Base: 1. A "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon" in the GY that was not first properly Special Summoned cannot be Special Summoned with "Rainbow Gravity".\n2. If an effect is chained that reduces the number of 'Crystal Beast' monsters with different names to 6 or less, the effect of "Rainbow Gravity" still resolves.

PSCT.Base: If you have 7 "Crystal Beast" cards with different names on the field or in your Graveyard: Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Crystal" monster from your Deck or Graveyard, ignoring the Summoning conditions.
